protectionCategory.title: Protection category

tooltip.0: Category I – buildings with the highest level of protection. These are production facilities with the presence of explosive zones of hazard classes B-I, II.
tooltip.1: Category II – buildings for production, storage purposes, open areas both with the storage of flammable liquids, combustible liquids, and with technological equipment installed on them; explosive industries, outdoor installations with a hazard class below B-Ia.
tooltip.2: Category III – construction objects for various purposes, residential and public buildings.

protectionCategory.warning: The use of a lightning protection mesh is unacceptable for category 1, we recommend installing <u>a lightning rod</u>

grid.title: Lightning mesh

masterLight.tooltip: The number on the left corresponds to the reflection coefficient of the ceiling, in the center – to the walls, to the right – to the floor. For office spaces with white walls and a light ceiling, a value of 805030 is recommended. The darker the room, the lower the reflection coefficient.

api.description: We have developed a software interface for setting up a smooth automatic exchange of information between our and your systems. With it, you can get information about articles, technical specifications, 3D models, CAD drawings, certificates, photo and video materials, and stock balances. Below is a detailed setup manual with a description of possible exchange methods and code examples.
api.title: API for partners

bitrix.description: A convenient way to set up a constant exchange between the EKF database and the website of the online store running on the 1C-Bitrix: Site Management system. With it, you can set up automatic updating of the item and all attributes, as well as updating the balances in the EKF warehouses. Below is an instruction for working with the module.
bitrix.title: 1C-Bitrix integration module
